long_description: Rain happens; be prepared. The women's Patagonia Torrentshell pants are an absolute must when swollen dark skies threaten to ruin your fun. Stretchy elasticized waistband is comfortable when worn over an insulating or base layer; internal drawcord snugs the fit. H2No(R) 2.5-layer ripstop nylon provides a waterproof and breathable barrier for maximum protection in severely wet weather. Water-resistant leg zippers go up to knees so pants easily slip on/off over shoes; rip-and-stick ankle closures seal the wet out. Articulated knees enhance comfort during movement. 2 handwarmer pockets and 1 back pocket all have stormflaps and water-resistant zippers. Pants stow in left handwarmer pocket; clip-in loop keeps pants handy when weather looks iffy. Patagonia Torrentshell pants have a regular fit.
short_description: Rain happens; be prepared. The women's Patagonia Torrentshell pants are an absolute must when swollen dark skies threaten to ruin your fun.
